doc:
Andrew Robinson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Robinson_(actor) 0 Andrew Jordt "Andy" Robinson (born February 14, 1942) is an American actor and the former director of the Master of Fine Arts acting program at the University of Southern California. Originally a stage actor, he works predominantly in supporting roles on television and in low-budget films. He is known for his portrayals of the serial killer Scorpio in the crime film Dirty Harry (1971), Larry Cotton in the horror film Hellraiser (1987), and Elim Garak on the science fiction television series Star Trek: Deep Space Nine (1993–1999). He and his wife Irene have a daughter, actress Rachel Robinson, who appeared in Deep Space Nine episode "The Visitor". Andrew_Jordt_"_Andy_"_Robinson ( born February_14_,_1942 ) is an_American_actor and the_former_director of the_Master of Fine_Arts acting program at the_University of Southern_California . Originally a_stage_actor , he works predominantly in supporting roles on television and in low-budget_films . He is_known for his_portrayals of the_serial_killer_Scorpio in the_crime_film_Dirty_Harry ( 1971_) , Larry_Cotton in the_horror_film_Hellraiser_(_1987_) , and Elim_Garak on the_science_fiction_television_series_Star_Trek : Deep_Space_Nine_(_1993 – 1999_) . He and his_wife_Irene have a_daughter , actress_Rachel_Robinson , who appeared in Deep_Space_Nine_episode " The_Visitor_" .
